Dating: CHRISTIAN PERIOD (not before); CHRISTIAN PERIOD; ISLAMIC PERIOD (not after)
Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL
Name: Lamp
Description: Low-bodied lamp. It has a barely marked spout with an oval opening for light. Flat disc and moulded border. The opening for fuel is circular in cross-section. Exterior surface covered with a red-coloured coating.
